title: Tour de France 2021 Standings
content:
General Classification / Yellow Jersey

Julian Alaphilippe leads the general classification after attacking to victory on stage one. He leads Michael Matthews and Primož Roglič, who stole minor time over his rivals by picking up four bonus seconds at the finish line.

1. Julian Alaphilippe
2. Michael Matthews +0:12
3. Primož Roglič +0:14
4. Jack Haig +0:18
5. Wilco Kelderman +0:18
6. Tadej Pogačar +0:18
7. David Gaudu +0:18
8. Sergio Higuita +0:18
9. Bauke Mollema +0:18
10. Geraint Thomas +0:18

Tour de France 2021 Guide

Points Classification / Green Jersey

1. Julian Alaphilippe - 50 points
2. Michael Matthews - 43 points
3. Ide Schelling - 20 points
4. Primož Roglič - 20 points
5. Jack Haig - 18 points

King of the Mountains Classification / Polka-Dot Jersey

Ide Schelling, who is participating in his first Tour de France, gained the polka-dot jersey on stage one. The Dutchman fell behind Anthony Perez early on, but a solo attack allowed him to move into the polka-dot jersey.

1. Ide Schelling - 3 points
2. Julian Alaphilippe - 2 points
3. Anthony Perez - 2 points
4. Danny van Poppel - 1 point
5. Victor Campenaerts - 1 point

Young Rider's Classification / White Jersey

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. David Gaudu
3. Sergio Higuita
4. Jonas Vingegaard
5. Lucas Hamilton

Team Classification

1. Team Jumbo-Visma
2. Astana - Premier Tech +0:00
3. Team BikeExchange +0:25
4. Trek - Segafredo +0:38
5. Bahrain - Victorious +0:41

Cover image: A.S.O./Alex Broadway
author: Peter Stuart
